page.title: 04A School Day cont.
page.content: When we have lunch, we have metal trays to eat off, which reminds me of prison. We go to the canteen, choose what we want and sit down to eat it. My favourite lesson is Drama. I like acting, and at my old school we did a good play where I had a main part. {Home Life:}When I go home I fling off my uniform and put on my tatty jeans and T-shirt. I have a guinea-pig called Flash. He is brown and white and runs as fast as anything. He lives in a cage in our back yard. His cage has 2 compartments- one for sleeping and one for eating. He is getting fat though, so I am putting him on a diet. After tea, I do my homework, watch T.V. or go out with my friends. My favourite T.V. programmes are cartoons. Then it is time to get ready for bed. {Carl Foster}
